attributes.action: Replace the government with the team from Top Gear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the current government to step down and be replaced with the team from top gear.  With Jeremy Clarkson as prime minister.  Actually we could replace the opposition with the team from Fifth gear, at least that would make question time interesting.  Lets be honest Clarkson couldn't do a worse job than the current PM

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
